title: Pet
synopsis: Despite endless research, the human mind remains a mystery to this day. Unknown to the public, there exist special individuals who are able to dive deep into the minds of people and even manipulate their memories.
voices: ['Ueda, Keisuke', 'Taniyama, Kishou', 'Kase, Yasuyuki', 'Ono, Yuuki', 'Sakuya, Shunsuke', 'Tobita, Nobuo', 'Ichimichi, Mao', 'Yusa, Kouji']
staff: [['Oomori, Takahiro', ['Director']], ['Ooshiro, Miyuki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Animation Director']], ['TK from Ling Tosite Sigure', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Memai SIREN', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Performance']]]
